name: Monica Copeland
text: I'd give a half star if I could. They called about 20 minutes after we ordered Saturday to say they couldn't deliver to us since they can't get into our building (it has controlled entry).  The tone used can best be described as a â€¦More

text: I wish i had seen the ablity to review this place sooner. I had placed an order for delivery because i had sick kids. Easy straight foreword "tripple sticks with bacon" that was all. An hour later the guy shows up with the abomination in â€¦More

name: Jessica Baumer
text: Wish I could give 0 stars. Ordered a pizza at 9:09pm and hadnâ€™t heard from the store at all or was our pizza delivered by 10:39. When we called she told us the store only staffed one driver and we could wait another HOUR AND 15 MINUTES. Or â€¦More

name: Tucker Aurich
text: I ordered pizza last night and it was great! Then, I tried to order tonight and they said its outside of their delivery area. On top of that, when I tried to call back, they didn't answer the phone at all. I'm not very happy with the customer service. I only live 2.7 miles from the store. I will not be going here again.

name: D H2
text: Best pizza ever

name: Curt Lansing
text: I'm done going here.  Last 2 times I ordered some wings, I go there well after the time I was told they were supposed to be ready and they aren't ready both times.  The first time I waited it out in the store, bored as hell for about 15 â€¦More

name: natasha holtzclaw
text: The only reason i give 3 , is because they gave no effort to deliver to me just down the county road 11.... i literally live a couple miles away and they wont deliver to me.... no convenience. Good crust, love the sauces. Needs to deliver to more areas.

name: Jenni LaPlante
text: We ordered a bunch of take out pizzas for a party like we have in the past. The were dry, not cheesy and over baked. Really disappointed we spent so much money on them. Never again

name: Anthony Sailer
text:
Food is good, delivery is slower than hell. I live a mile away. I only order when I'm drinking with the neighbors. If food comes under an hour and a half I feel lucky.
Hire more people...

name: Cisco Claasy
text: I ordered this pizza from your location yesterday. I was very excited until I realized the entire pizza was moldy. Me, being someone who doesn't waste, I ate the pizza anyway. I still am glued to the toilet seat, but at least I got my Maui â€¦More

name: Brooke Moore
text: I ordered wings online and didn't realize they had boneless, so my husband called the store and Joshua was absolutely amazing and accommodated to all of my wing needs. He then proceeded to call me to let me know they were done. No place has ever treated me so well. I will definitely be going here more often! Thank you, Joshua!

name: Ryann M
text: The first time I ordered Toppers months ago I hated it, but no where was open past 11 for delivery besides here so I decided to give Toppers another shot. The Spicy Pepperoni is so much better than the original, it adds flavor to the pizza. â€¦More

name: Frankii Moon
text: Best crust best portion of toppings....  Truly on time and we'll worth a half hour. In my speed dial!

name: Raj T.
text: Ordered here a million times from the same address for a few years, and I just got denied because all of a sudden I'm out of the delivery area. Offered to pay with my credit card with an amazing tip to do so, and still got denied. Business â€¦More

name: Matt Leeder
text: I was a little worried about going here the first time. After that, I love to eat the food from here!!!! I wish I could get food from here more often than I do! I would say if you haven't been here yet, you don't know what you are â€¦More

name: Jenny Johnson
text: AMAZING staff!! Great food and service is always exceptional. I highly recommend this place.

name: Kevin Barnd
text: We used to get excellent pizza and service but it seems to have gone terribly down hill. The last time I ordered, the delivery was so late that I ended up having to come pick it up myself. And then the pizza was cold after sitting out so â€¦More

name: Eric Russell
text: I love the pizza, but their online deal of $9.99 for a large 1 topping pizza will guaranteed charge you $10.50 for it.  It's not tax (That's included later).  It isn't delivery fee (that's $3).  It just charges you $10.50 for a $9.99 deal. â€¦More

name: Kelsey White
text: we order from toppers consistently, but 9/10 times it takes at least 10 min for someone to answer the phone. Then delivery is "in about an hour or so". The only positive people I talk to are the people bringing the 'za. â€¦More

name: Sydney Newman
text: Love Toppers! They have vegan and vegetarian options, and are usually faster than all the other pizza places in town. Only thing I find odd is their dough is a bit sweet, but don't let that stop you from trying Toppers and their unusual toppings!

name: John Bittorf
text: Just started delivering for toppers, thank you to our loyal customers.

name: Meagan Chalmers
text: Awesome pizza, Topper's stix, and mac and cheese. I've never had an ok pizza here, it's always been AWESOME! Staff is fun and friendly! My family loves Toppers!

name: Amber Schueler
text: Called 4 times on a Friday night, all before 10pm, and no one cares enough about their job to even answer the phone.  Hire better staff

name: JROCK O
text: My wife put an order in for some bread sticks and Pizza for pickup. The plan was for me to pick it up after I got off of work..an 11 hour shift. I get there and they didn't have any orders under my name....this was placed an hour ago. They â€¦More

name: Tyler Lundquist
text: The service was terrible! Ordered a pizza 2 hours ahead for delivery. Called when it was 30 min late. Said sorry there's nothing we can do.... I'll never again utilize this "service"

name: Joseph Lindberg
text: Fantastic pizza with numerous specialty pizzas or build your own.   Wings and delicious cheese breads are available as well.  The staff was very friendly and willing to make accommodations and suggestions.

name: Jeressa OLeary
text: This is was really good pizza for the price. Delivery was super hot when it got here. Polite driver. Can't ask for more than that.

name: Barber Mug
text: Late delivery. Called and the driver just left but no explanation as to why it took so long.  Called back to cancel order, got explanation at that time.  Poor communication!  Just tell me what's going on and I'll def understand what's up.  Too bad... I enjoyed this place but it's going downhill.

name: eddy O
text: i had a yummy puzza last night huh...want some more...damnðŸ˜›your pizza is yummy...delicious is under rated.. huh... this best than papa johns,dominos,name them... i had large half peperoni with sausage and half ranch,chicken and green papers huh...

text: Good pizza but certainly a little pricey.

name: Jordon Kinney
text: You call your self a pizza place but don't know how to make one. Twice now you F'ed up my order. Maybe "Come Slower and Apologize". Rude staff and don't know how to make a pizza. â€¦More

text: Just stopped in to order take out after work. Music playing was different. Digital techno music. Pizzas were great.

name: Nicole Neuman
text: Called to order.... no one answered. Ordered online, cause maybe theyâ€™re busy, ya know benfit of the doubt. Itâ€™s now been over an hour since we ordered. Will our pizza ever show up? Probably not. Itâ€™s a shame because I love toppers. Donâ€™t think weâ€™ll be ordering from this location again.

text: Awesome,  Thank you my Family really enjoy the pizza and the  hot wings.

name: Marcus Dachel
text: It has been so busy and unorganized there lately. My husband and I went in a few days ago for an order of the cheese sticks and a small pizza only to wait for 50 minutes. The "manager"(Kaleb) that was working was very rude as well. Also, he â€¦More

name: Daniel Albing
text: We love this pizza place. Friendly staff, great food, quick delivery. The price isn't the lowest you'll find, but if you want good pizza it's worth it.

name: Breanna Robinson
text: Went in and ordered there first time going was quick to get food but very disappointed that when we got home the bacon sticks we ordered didnt have bacon on them..... not a good first impression also the pizza didnt have a whole lot of toppings

name: Gwyn Kitzinger
text: Good cheese sticks but the pizza sucks. Also, don't order delivery unless you have 1 1/2 hours to wait. I've ordered the cheese sticks multiple times and have never received the order in under an hour.

name: craig arth
text: Exactly service and a really nice waiting area

name: Jacob Sorteberg
text: Ordered online for pickup in 15 mins, arrived on time and order was not started; waited another 20 mins for food to be ready. Nothing spectacular for a specialty pizza + mac n cheese. Likely won't order again.

text: What other chain takes 2 hours to deliver pizza less than 3 miles away on a Wednesday? Their delivery wait time is atrocious! Extremely inconvenient for convenience food
